snippet: That film repeated as the No. 1 movie in North America, taking in an estimated $61.1 million for a two-week total of over $251 million, according to Hollywood.com, which complies box-office data.
abstract: That film repeated as the No. 1 movie in North America, taking in an estimated $61.1 million for a two-week total of over $251 million, according to Hollywood.com, which complies box-office data.

headline.main: Another Big Weekend for 'The Hunger Games'
headline.print_headline: Another Big Weekend for ‘The Hunger Games’
